name: Gale's End: Spring Stories
description:
As a travel writer, you've come to Gale's End seeking inspiration. What stories will you tell of this spring? 

FEATURES: 

  • Six Character Routes
  • Two Possible Endings Per Character
  • Four Overall Types of Endings
  • 42,000+ Words

Gale's End: Spring Stories is a friendship-focused, multi-route visual novel about befriending the residents of Gale's End. This project was created for the Gale's End March 2023 Game Jam. 

Gale's End is a Discord-based roleplay group with farming sim gameplay elements, dedicated to community building and story crafting at your own comfortable pace. 

Our game guide will be updated as members of Gale's End make new discoveries. 

NOTE: Gale's End, the setting, and its lore belong to Pai (applePAI) and Lanna (knvoa). The characters and their stories featured in this game belong to their respective muns.  Please do not RP any of the characters, create any RP groups based off of Gale's End, or create inappropriate works based off of the characters and setting.
